entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 11:00 PM CDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
